title: Handle Report of Phishing Email
description: A customer reports receiving a suspicious email that looks like it's from the company but asks for their password.

tasks.description: Advise the customer that the email is fraudulent and they should not click any links or provide information.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides immediate, clear security advice.

tasks.description: Ask the customer to forward the suspicious email to the company's security department for investigation.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the correct email address (e.g., security@company.com) for reporting.

tasks.description: Recommend that the customer change their account password as a precaution.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides a link to the legitimate password reset page.
